AddLFTagsToResource.name: AddLFTagsToResource
AddLFTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to attach Lake Formation tags to catalog resources

BatchGrantPermissions.name: BatchGrantPermissions
BatchGrantPermissions.description: Grants permission to data lake permissions to one or more principals in a batch

BatchRevokePermissions.name: BatchRevokePermissions
BatchRevokePermissions.description: Grants permission to revoke data lake permissions from one or more principals in a batch

CancelTransaction.name: CancelTransaction
CancelTransaction.description: Grants permission to cancel the given transaction

CommitTransaction.name: CommitTransaction
CommitTransaction.description: Grants permission to commit the given transaction

CreateDataCellsFilter.name: CreateDataCellsFilter
CreateDataCellsFilter.description: Grants permission to create a Lake Formation data cell filter

CreateLFTag.name: CreateLFTag
CreateLFTag.description: Grants permission to create a Lake Formation tag

CreateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.name: CreateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfiguration
CreateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.description: Grants permission to create an IAM Identity Center connection with Lake Formation to allow IAM Identity Center users and groups to access Data Catalog resources

CreateLakeFormationOptIn.name: CreateLakeFormationOptIn
CreateLakeFormationOptIn.description: Grants permission to enforce Lake Formation permissions for the given databases, tables, and principals

DeleteDataCellsFilter.name: DeleteDataCellsFilter
DeleteDataCellsFilter.description: Grants permission to delete a Lake Formation data cell filter

DeleteLFTag.name: DeleteLFTag
DeleteLFTag.description: Grants permission to delete a Lake Formation tag

DeleteLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.name: DeleteLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfiguration
DeleteLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.description: Grants permission to delete an IAM Identity Center connection with Lake Formation

DeleteLakeFormationOptIn.name: DeleteLakeFormationOptIn
DeleteLakeFormationOptIn.description: Grants permission to remove the Lake Formation permissions enforcement of the given databases, tables, and principals

DeleteObjectsOnCancel.name: DeleteObjectsOnCancel
DeleteObjectsOnCancel.description: Grants permission to delete the specified objects if the transaction is canceled

DeregisterResource.name: DeregisterResource
DeregisterResource.description: Grants permission to deregister a registered location

DescribeLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfi.name: DescribeLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfiguration
DescribeLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfi.description: Grants permission to describe the IAM Identity Center connection with Lake Formation

DescribeResource.name: DescribeResource
DescribeResource.description: Grants permission to describe a registered location

DescribeTransaction.name: DescribeTransaction
DescribeTransaction.description: Grants permission to get status of the given transaction

ExtendTransaction.name: ExtendTransaction
ExtendTransaction.description: Grants permission to extend the timeout of the given transaction

GetDataAccess.name: GetDataAccess
GetDataAccess.description: Grants permission to virtual data lake access

GetDataCellsFilter.name: GetDataCellsFilter
GetDataCellsFilter.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Lake Formation data cell filter

GetDataLakePrincipal.name: GetDataLakePrincipal
GetDataLakePrincipal.description: Grants permission to retrieve the identity of the invoking principal

GetDataLakeSettings.name: GetDataLakeSettings
GetDataLakeSettings.description: Grants permission to retrieve data lake settings such as the list of data lake administrators and database and table default permissions

GetEffectivePermissionsForPath.name: GetEffectivePermissionsForPath
GetEffectivePermissionsForPath.description: Grants permission to retrieve permissions attached to resources in the given path

GetLFTag.name: GetLFTag
GetLFTag.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Lake Formation tag

GetQueryState.name: GetQueryState
GetQueryState.description: Grants permission to retrieve the state of the given query

GetQueryStatistics.name: GetQueryStatistics
GetQueryStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve the statistics for the given query

GetResourceLFTags.name: GetResourceLFTags
GetResourceLFTags.description: Grants permission to retrieve lakeformation tags on a catalog resource

GetTableObjects.name: GetTableObjects
GetTableObjects.description: Grants permission to retrieve objects from a table

GetWorkUnitResults.name: GetWorkUnitResults
GetWorkUnitResults.description: Grants permission to retrieve the results for the given work units

GetWorkUnits.name: GetWorkUnits
GetWorkUnits.description: Grants permission to retrieve the work units for the given query

GrantPermissions.name: GrantPermissions
GrantPermissions.description: Grants permission to data lake permissions to a principal

ListDataCellsFilter.name: ListDataCellsFilter
ListDataCellsFilter.description: Grants permission to list cell filters

ListLFTags.name: ListLFTags
ListLFTags.description: Grants permission to list Lake Formation tags

ListLakeFormationOptIns.name: ListLakeFormationOptIns
ListLakeFormationOptIns.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current list of resources and principals that are opt in to enforce Lake Formation permissions

ListPermissions.name: ListPermissions
ListPermissions.description: Grants permission to list permissions filtered by principal or resource

ListResources.name: ListResources
ListResources.description: Grants permission to List registered locations

ListTableStorageOptimizers.name: ListTableStorageOptimizers
ListTableStorageOptimizers.description: Grants permission to list all the storage optimizers for the Governed table

ListTransactions.name: ListTransactions
ListTransactions.description: Grants permission to list all transactions in the system

PutDataLakeSettings.name: PutDataLakeSettings
PutDataLakeSettings.description: Grants permission to overwrite data lake settings such as the list of data lake administrators and database and table default permissions

RegisterResource.name: RegisterResource
RegisterResource.description: Grants permission to register a new location to be managed by Lake Formation

RemoveLFTagsFromResource.name: RemoveLFTagsFromResource
RemoveLFTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove lakeformation tags from catalog resources

RevokePermissions.name: RevokePermissions
RevokePermissions.description: Grants permission to revoke data lake permissions from a principal

SearchDatabasesByLFTags.name: SearchDatabasesByLFTags
SearchDatabasesByLFTags.description: Grants permission to list catalog databases with Lake Formation tags

SearchTablesByLFTags.name: SearchTablesByLFTags
SearchTablesByLFTags.description: Grants permission to list catalog tables with Lake Formation tags

StartQueryPlanning.name: StartQueryPlanning
StartQueryPlanning.description: Grants permission to initiate the planning of the given query

StartTransaction.name: StartTransaction
StartTransaction.description: Grants permission to start a new transaction

UpdateDataCellsFilter.name: UpdateDataCellsFilter
UpdateDataCellsFilter.description: Grants permission to update a Lake Formation data cell filter

UpdateLFTag.name: UpdateLFTag
UpdateLFTag.description: Grants permission to update a Lake Formation tag

UpdateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.name: UpdateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfiguration
UpdateLakeFormationIdentityCenterConfigu.description: Grants permission to update the IAM Identity Center connection parameters

UpdateResource.name: UpdateResource
UpdateResource.description: Grants permission to update a registered location

UpdateTableObjects.name: UpdateTableObjects
UpdateTableObjects.description: Grants permission to add or delete the specified objects to or from a table

UpdateTableStorageOptimizer.name: UpdateTableStorageOptimizer
UpdateTableStorageOptimizer.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of the storage optimizer for the Governed table
